tool_description: Messente group messaging platform provides an HTTP-based PushSMS interface additionally to the web-based message sending tools. In order to use the HTTP-based interface please activate your API account on the Messente web page.
name: Messente
title: Messente

api_list.name: Syncronous Delivery Report (DLR)
api_list.description: Ask for current SMS Delivery Report (DLR)

required_parameters.name: sms_unique_id
required_parameters.description: ID that was returned with successful send_sms request

api_list.name: Country Pricing
api_list.description: Get the prices to all operators in this country

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Desired response format. Currently supported: json / xml, defaults to json

api_list.name: Account Full Pricelist
api_list.description: Get the full Messente pricelist in CSV format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://messente-messente.p.rapidapi.com/pricelist/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "messente-messente.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://messente-messente.p.rapidapi.com/pricelist/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "messente-messente.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
